alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:24PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Androscoggin and central Cumberland Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 323 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Auburn to near Standish. Movement was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lewiston, Auburn, Naples, Turner, Gray, Raymond, Standish, Lisbon, Greene, Durham, Casco, Limington, Frye Island, New Gloucester, Poland, Sebago, Baldwin, Minot, Sabattus and Windham. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 65 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior York
